name: Grookey

evolution.description: Grookey can evolve into Thwackey at level 6 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 6 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Chimp Pokémon. Grookey attacks by beating with a stick. As the speed of its beats increases, Grookey's excitement does too.

abilities.name: Overgrow
abilities.description: This Pokémon doubles its STAB bonus when it has 25% or less of its maximum health.

abilities.name: Grassy Surge
abilities.description: If the move is known, this Pokémon may use the Grassy Terrain move as a bonus action.
